mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.f_erpid AS "erpid", a.f_number AS "number", a.f_name AS "name", a.f_modifytime AS "modifytime", a.f_status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_warehouse( id, f_erpid, f_number, f_name, f_modifytime, f_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{erpid}, #{number}, #{name}, #{modifytime}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_warehouse SET f_erpid = #{erpid}, f_number = #{number}, f_name = #{name}, f_modifytime = #{modifytime}, f_status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
